languages.text: "Груз представляет из себя оружие — клинки причудливой формы из костей и живой плоти. Оно... оно повторяет ваше имя, Лорд-капитан, и в своих стонах утверждает, что вы спасли его из Комморры. Рядом с ним была обнаружена странная рогатая маска ксеносского происхождения".

"The cargo itself is weaponry — intricate blades made of bones and living flesh. Those weapons... they keep repeating your name, Lord Captain, and claim in their moans that you saved them from Commorragh. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."
languages.original_text: "Груз представляет из себя оружие — клинки причудливой формы из костей и живой плоти. Оно... оно повторяет ваше имя, Лорд-капитан, и в своих стонах утверждает, что вы спасли его из Комморры. Рядом с ним была обнаружена странная рогатая маска ксеносского происхождения".

traits.locale_text: "The item itself is a set of weapons, intricate blades made of bones and living flesh. They... they repeat your name, Lord Captain, and state in their moans that you saved them from Commorragh. Next to them crewmen found a strange horned mask of the xenos origin."

"The item itself is a set of weapons, intricate blades made of bones and living flesh. They... they repeat your name, Lord Captain, and state in their moans that you saved them from Commorragh. Next to them crewmen found a strange horned mask of the xenos origin."

"The cargo itself is weaponry — intricate blades made of bones and living flesh. They... they keep repeating your name, Lord Captain, and state in their moans that you saved them from Commorragh. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origins."

"The cargo itself is weaponry — intricate blades made of bones and living flesh. They... they keep repeating your name, Lord Captain, and state in their moans that you saved them from Commorragh. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origins."

"The cargo itself is weaponry — intricate blades made of bones and living flesh. Those weapons... they keep repeating your name, Lord Captain, and claim in their moans that you saved them from Commorragh. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."

languages.text: “这些货物就像是一件武器一样，是一大堆由骨头和活肉制成的刀刃。它们……它们不停地重复您的名字，舰长大人，呻吟着说是你把他们从科摩罗救了出来。在它们旁边，船员发现了一个古怪的异形面具，上面带着角。”
languages.original_text: "The cargo itself is weaponry — intricate blades made of bones and living flesh. Those weapons... they keep repeating your name, Lord Captain, and claim in their moans that you saved them from Commorragh. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."

traits.locale_text: “这些货物就像是一件武器一样，是一大堆由骨头和活肉制成的刀刃。它们……它们不停地重复您的名字，舰长大人，呻吟着说是你把他们从科摩罗救了出来。在它们旁边，船员发现了一个古怪的异形面具，上面带着角。”

languages.text: « La cargaison en elle-même est constituée d'armes, des lames complexes faites d'os et de chair vivante. Ces armes... elles ne cessent de répéter votre nom, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et affirment que vous les avez sauvées de Commorragh. À côté d'elles, l'équipage a trouvé un masque étrange d'origine xénos. »
languages.original_text: "The cargo itself is weaponry — intricate blades made of bones and living flesh. Those weapons... they keep repeating your name, Lord Captain, and claim in their moans that you saved them from Commorragh. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."

traits.locale_text: « La cargaison en elle-même est constituée d'armes, des lames complexes faites d'os et de chair vivante. Ces armes... elles ne cessent de répéter votre nom, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et affirment que vous les avez sauvées de Commorragh. À côté d'elles, l'équipage a trouvé un masque étrange d'origine xénos. »

languages.text: "Die Fracht selbst ist eine Waffe – verworrene Klingen aus Knochen und lebendigem Fleisch. Diese Waffen ... sie wiederholen immer wieder Euren Namen, Lord Captain, und behaupten stöhnend, dass Ihr sie aus Commorragh gerettet hättet. Neben ihnen fand die Crew eine seltsam gehörnte Maske, wie sie von Xenos getragen wird."
languages.original_text: "The cargo itself is weaponry — intricate blades made of bones and living flesh. Those weapons... they keep repeating your name, Lord Captain, and claim in their moans that you saved them from Commorragh. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."

traits.locale_text: "Die Fracht selbst ist eine Waffe – verworrene Klingen aus Knochen und lebendigem Fleisch. Diese Waffen ... sie wiederholen immer wieder Euren Namen, Lord Captain, und behaupten stöhnend, dass Ihr sie aus Commorragh gerettet hättet. Neben ihnen fand die Crew eine seltsam gehörnte Maske, wie sie von Xenos getragen wird."

"Die Fracht selbst ist eine Waffe – verworrene Klingen aus Knochen und lebendigem Fleisch. Sie ... sie wiederholen immer wieder Eurem Namen, Lord Captain, und behaupten stöhnend, dass Ihr sie aus Commorragh gerettet hättet. Neben ihnen fand die Crew eine seltsam gehörnte Maske, wie sie von Xenos getragen wird."

languages.text: «Dicho cargamento son armas: unas peculiares espadas hechas de huesos y carne viva. Lord Capitán, las armas no dejan de repetir su nombre y de afirmar entre gemidos que los ha salvado de Commorragh. Además, el personal a bordo ha encontrado una extraña máscara xenos con cuernos junto a ellas».
languages.original_text: "The cargo itself is weaponry — intricate blades made of bones and living flesh. Those weapons... they keep repeating your name, Lord Captain, and claim in their moans that you saved them from Commorragh. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."

traits.locale_text: «Dicho cargamento son armas: unas peculiares espadas hechas de huesos y carne viva. Lord Capitán, las armas no dejan de repetir su nombre y de afirmar entre gemidos que los ha salvado de Commorragh. Además, el personal a bordo ha encontrado una extraña máscara xenos con cuernos junto a ellas».

languages.text: 「積荷そのものが武器です。骨と生きた肉でできた精巧な刃です。その武器たちは…ロード・キャプテン、あなたの名を繰り返し叫び、コモラフから救ってくれたとうめいています。そのそばには、異種族由来の奇妙な角付きの仮面をクルーが発見しました」
languages.original_text: "The cargo itself is weaponry — intricate blades made of bones and living flesh. Those weapons... they keep repeating your name, Lord Captain, and claim in their moans that you saved them from Commorragh. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."

traits.locale_text: 「積荷そのものが武器です。骨と生きた肉でできた精巧な刃です。その武器たちは…ロード・キャプテン、あなたの名を繰り返し叫び、コモラフから救ってくれたとうめいています。そのそばには、異種族由来の奇妙な角付きの仮面をクルーが発見しました」

languages.text: "Mevzubahis gönderinin muhtevası; ince işçilikli silahlar, kemik ve canlı dokudan yapılma. Bu silahlar... Mütemadiyen isminizi tekrar ediyor Lord Kaptan. Devamlı inleyerek onları Commorragh'tan kurtardığınızı söylüyorlar. Mürettebat; yanlarında zeno menşeli, tuhaf, boynuzlu bir maske de buldu."
languages.original_text: "The cargo itself is weaponry — intricate blades made of bones and living flesh. Those weapons... they keep repeating your name, Lord Captain, and claim in their moans that you saved them from Commorragh. Next to them, the crew found a strange horned mask of xenos origin."
